altTitles.ja: 救世主の生き残り

description.en:
In order to stop the invasion of the demons and seal the evil god which has been resurrected after a thousand years, Grey embarks on a journey together with his sister, Fiona, and his comrades. 

At the end of their journey, they were facing the evil god, and all of his comrades including his little sister were killed because of the evil god.

 

Being the only survivor of the journey, Grey was hailed as a hero and was granted the throne as the emperor of the holy empire, gaining glory and authority. 

 

Unfortunately, Grey couldn’t recover from the grief of losing his one and only sister, and decided to use any means necessary to revive her. After countless attempts to try and revive his sister, Grey became hopeless, until he heard a mysterious voice saying,

 

 [Do you want to save the most precious person in your life?]

 

[If you’re willing to sacrifice everything, I will show you the way.]

 

After making a deal with the mysterious voice,

Grey found himself standing in his hometown that was supposed to be destroyed by the invasion of the demons…

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)

description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

title.en: I'm a Villain, but I Saved the Female Lead

altTitles.ja: 悪女なのにヒロインを救ってしまった

altTitles.en: I'm a Villainess, but I Saved the Heroine
I'm a Villainess, but I Saved the Female Lead
I'm a Villain, but I Saved the Heroine

description.en:
I transmigrated into a novel as the villainess Rubelina, whose hopes of marrying the Crown Prince were dashed by the heroine Yvonne. I believed I could live happily as long as I stayed out of the love story between the heroine and the hero, Zilart. I lived my life without caring about them at all and as a result, the heroine and the hero became engaged without any trouble.

Thinking that my role was over, I was living peacefully when suddenly Yvonne came to visit me and blurted out:

"I want to break off my engagement with Prince Zilart!"

Um... in the novel, Rubelina is supposed to be the villainess, and Yvonne is supposed to be the heroine who lives happily ever after, isn't she...?

title.en: Story of a Small Senpai in My Company

altTitles.ja: うちの会社の小さい先輩の話

altTitles.ja-ro: Uchi no Kaisha no Chiisai Senpai no Hanashi

altTitles.en: Story of a Small Senior in My Company

description.en:
**-*"My senpai from work… is tiny and cute."***  
Shinozaki is an office worker who is taken care of and coddled by his senior team member Shiori Katase: a gorgeous, profoundly kind, loving, and diminutive woman. Shinozaki certainly hopes that she's not doing it out of duty… but her joy of doing so increasingly exposes her feelings!  
  
*This page refers to the popular webcomic's official serialization, which began on the Storia DASH website on April 3, 2020.*
description.pt-br:
-"Minha Senpai do trabalho... é pequena e fofa."

Shinozaki é um funcionário de escritório que é orientado e mimado pela sua Senpai Shiori Katase, que é linda, gentil, amável e pequena.

Shinozaki certamente espera que ela não esteja fazendo isso por obrigação... mas a sua alegria em fazê-lo cada vez mais expõe os sentimentos dela!

Esta página refere-se à serialização oficial da popular webcomic, que começou no site Storia DASH em 3 de abril de 2020.

altTitles.en: Studio Apartment, Good Lighting, Angel Included.

altTitles.ja: ワンルーム、日当たり普通、天使つき。

altTitles.zh: 單間, 光照尚好, 附帶天使

description.en:
What will happen when you wake up, and find a cute girl lying next to you in bed? Furthermore, she is not an ordinary girl, but an Angel who comes from Heaven???

Shintarou Tokamitsu is a high school boy living alone. One day, he found a beautiful girl sitting on his balcony. Her name is Towa, but what is her true identity? A romantic comedy between two innocent souls.
description.ja: 人暮らしの男子高校生、徳光森太郎。彼が自宅のベランダで出会ったのは清楚で優しい女の子『とわ』。けれど彼女の正体は…？　無垢な二人の胸キュン同居ラブコメディ♪
description.vi: Chúng ta đã quen với câu chuyện về anh nhân viên nhặt được bé JK tại lề đường. Nhưng sẽ ra sao nếu vẫn với chủ đề nhặt được người ấy, cậu học sinh năm nhất cao trung lại nhặt được một thiên thần từ Thiên Đàng ngay trong căn hộ của cậu ta? Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo??

altTitles.en: They Say I'm the Villainous Young Miss

altTitles.vi: Họ Đồn Tôi Là Đại Tiểu Thư Xấu Xa

description.en: I worked as a manhua artist, then died from pulling an all-nighter. I woke up as the villainess "Emi Morwen" from my webcomic! Emi was an alluring yet cruel character who departed from the story by ending her own life. However, I’m not the real Emi!
description.vi: 《Sau khi thức quá khuya, chạy deadline để rồi kết thúc sinh mệnh, tôi đã tái sinh thành nhân vật phản diện trong truyện tranh của mình》

altTitles.ja: リバーシブルフレンド

description.en: After a night out partying, Mitsuhashi takes Yuki, his drunk best friend (with benefits), home. But, the night isn't over for Yuki when he decides to top the night off...by topping Mitsuhashi. Sleepy and satisfied, Yuki thinks he can drift off after finishing.
description.pt-br: Depois de uma noite de festa, Mitsuhashi leva Yuki, o seu melhor amigo bêbado (com benefícios), para casa. Mas a noite ainda não acabou para Yuki quando ele decide terminar a noite... dando uma queca a Mitsuhashi. Sonolento e satisfeito, Yuki pensa que pode adormecer depois de terminar.

altTitles.ja: あつまれ！ふしぎ研究部

description.en: Goryo Daisuke is still unsure about which club to join. When he meets the three girl members of Mysterious Research Club while looking for the school's warehouse, he gets hypnotized to sign the registration form. Suzu who is obsessed with scary curses, Chiaki who only relies on her monstrous strength to perform dangerous magic tricks, and Kotone who can control people by hypnosis.
description.pt-br: Goryo Daisuke ainda não sabe ao certo a qual clube ingressar. Quando ele conhece as três garotas do Clube de Pesquisa Misteriosa enquanto procura o depósito da escola, ele fica hipnotizado para assinar o formulário de inscrição. Suzu, que é obcecada por maldições assustadoras, Chiaki, que só conta com sua força monstruosa para realizar truques de mágica perigosos, e Kotone, que pode controlar as pessoas por meio da hipnose.

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.

altTitles.ja: 冬月

description.en: A gay sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.
description.fr: Suivez les aventures d'un sorcier gay et d'une jolie prêtresse en plein cœur d'un RPG.

description.pt-br: Um feiticeiro homossexual e uma sacerdotisa sedutora se cruzam em um RPG online.

altTitles.ja: 儚いキミは猛攻をはじめる

altTitles.ja-ro: Hakanai Kimi wa Moukou wo Hajimeru

altTitles.zh: 童话般的你开始了恋爱猛攻

description.en: Kagari, an ephemeral beauty, reunites with her older childhood friend, Nana-kun, and begins her romantic assault on him.
description.vi: Một series siêu ngọt nữa tới từ Hazano Kazutake - tác giả của bộ Thánh nữ Cecilia và mục sư Lawrence. Câu chuyện về đôi bạn thưở nhỏ cứ tối đến là lại ở chung nhà để đảm bảo sự an toàn cho nhau...

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
The cute Kyuu-chan is a wonder cat. Dance, sing, be happy together!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

description.en: Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.

"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

title.en: Kono Fukushuu ni Gyaru wa Iranai

altTitles.ja: この復讐にギャルはいらない
抱けど暮らせど「好き」が言えない

description.en:
Tomoe Mochisaka, who has been living at the bottom of the pile, meets a man named Hajime Shiroyama at a company party at a large white company where she has changed jobs.
He is so handsome that, without knowing his name, she has the first one-night stand with him in her life...but this man is not only good-looking, he is also good-looking! He is a winner with a good face, a good body, and a good position! He is a winner. He is a winner with not only a good face, but also a good body and a good position!

On the contrary to Tomoe, who was happy to have finally met a very handsome man as a friend, Shiroyama was thinking about the fact...!
You can't get through to him no matter how much you hold him! An exhilarating romantic comedy with a difference!

title.en: A Returner's Magic Should Be Special

altTitles.ja: 帰還者の魔法は特別です

altTitles.zh-hk: 重生者的魔法一定要特別

altTitles.th: พลังขั้นเทพของจอมเวทจุติใหม่

altTitles.es: La magia de un retornado debe ser especial

altTitles.vi: Ma thuật đặc biệt của phù thủy quay ngược thời gian

altTitles.pt-br: A Magia de um Retornado Tem de Ser Especial

description.de:
"Jetzt, wo ich zurückgekehrt bin, werde ich keinen meiner Liebsten wieder sterben lassen!" Das Labyrinth der Schatten - die tödlichste Katastrophe, der die Menschheit jemals gegenüberstand. Desir Arman, einer der sechs Überlebenden der Menschheit, befindet sich im Labyrinth. Die sechs versuchen gemeinsam, die letzte Prüfung des Labyrinths zu meistern, scheitern aber, woraufhin die Welt untergeht. Aber als sich Desir gerade auf sein Ende vorbereitet, erscheint plötzlich vor ihm die Welt … von vor 13 Jahren?! Desir ist in die Vergangenheit zurückgekehrt, in eine Zeit, als er Schüler an der besten Magierschule seines war. Er und seine Liebsten wurden wieder vereint, und er ist entschlossen, dieses Mal sie und die Welt zu retten! Es bleiben noch drei Jahre bevor die Schattenwelt erscheint! Ändere die Vergangenheit und versammle mächtige Kameraden um dich, um die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en:
"Now that I'm back, I won't allow my loved ones to die again!"  
  
The Shadow Labyrinth - the deadliest catastrophe humanity has ever known.  
Desir Arman, one of the six remaining survivors of mankind, is inside the Labyrinth. The six of them attempt to clear the final level of the Labyrinth but ultimately fail, and the world comes to an end.  
However, when Desir thought he would meet his demise, what appears before him is the world… thirteen years ago?!  
  
Desir is returned to the past, back to the time when he enrolled at the nation's finest magic academy, Havrion. He is reunited with his precious friends, and he is determined to change the past to save the world and his loved ones…!  
  
Three years remain before the emergence of the Shadow World!  
Change the past and gather powerful comrades to save mankind!

description.fr:
Le monde est au bord de la destruction après une guerre dévastatrice de dix ans dans le « Labyrinthe des ombres ». Desir Herrman est l'un des derniers magiciens restants, mais il n'est pas assez puissant pour combattre l'ennemi fatal qui menace l'Humanité. Alors qu'il est certain que la fin est proche, il est renvoyé dans le temps, à l'époque où il étudiait la magie à la prestigieuse Académie Hebrion ! Grâce à cette seconde chance, Desir est bien décidé à sauver non seulement sa peau, mais également celle de ses amis et camarades perdus. Sachant déjà ce que le futur leur réserve, ses efforts pourront-ils faire la différence, ou bien seront-ils tous condamnés à revivre le même destin tragique ? Adapté du roman phare.

description.id:
"Agak disesalkan, tapi sebaiknya kita bersia-siap untuk mati!"
"Apa dunia akan benar-benar berakhir di sini?!"

Desir mengira semua sudah berakhir. Namun, ternyata dia kembali ke ujian masuk akademi hevrion 13 tahun yang lalu! Ia kembali berkumpul dengan orang-orang tercinta yang mati dalam dunia bayangan. Tiga tahun tersisa sebelum dunia bayangan muncul! 

"Kesempatan datang lagi, aku tidak akan kehilangan orang-orang yang kucintai untuk kedua kalinya!"

description.ja:
人類が迎えた最悪の災害、影の迷宮。 「デジール・アルマン」は影の迷宮の中で最後まで生き残った生存者6人のうちの1人である。 彼らは影の迷宮の最後のボスに挑戦したが、失敗し、世界は滅亡を迎えてしまった。 全てが終わったと思った瞬間、「デジール」の目の前に見える光景は…13年前の世界！？ 帝国最高の魔法学院、へブリオン学園の入学式に戻ってきた「デジール」 最悪の災害「影の世界」発生までの残りの時間は3年！ 過去を変え、強い仲間を集めて、世界を救えることはできるだろうか！

description.ko:
"다시 돌아온 이상, 사랑하는 사람들을 두 번 잃을 순 없어!"

인류가 맞이한 최악의 재앙, 그림자 미궁.
데지르 아르망은 미궁 속에서 
마지막까지 살아남은 최후의 생존자 6명 중 한 명이다.
그들은 그림자 미궁의 마지막 단계에 도전하지만 결국 실패하고
세계는 멸망을 맞이하고 만다.

모든 게 끝이라 생각했던 순간,
데지르의 눈앞에 펼쳐진 것은 다름 아닌 13년 전의 세상?!

제국 최고의 마법 학원, 헤브리온에 입학했던 순간으로 돌아온 데지르.
그림자 미궁에서 잃었던 소중한 사람들과 재회하게 되고,
사랑하는 사람들과 세상을 구하기 위해 과거를 바꾸고자 하는데…!

그림자 세계 발생까지 남은 시간은 3년!
과거를 바꾸고, 강한 동료를 모아 세상을 구원하라!

description.ru:
"Теперь, когда я вернулся, я не позволю дорогим для меня людям снова умереть".
Лабиринт Теней – главная катастрофа для человечества за всю историю его существования.
Дезир Арман – один из шести выживших людей.

Шесть попыток зачистить последний уровень лабиринта потерпели полную неудачу, и теперь мир близится к концу.
Однако, когда Дезир готовится встретить свою кончину, то, что открывается перед ним – это мир... 13 лет назад?!

Дезир возвращается в прошлое, когда он только поступил в самую престижную магическую академию магии в стране – Хаврион. Он вновь воссоединился со своими дорогими друзьями и готов изменить прошлое, чтобы спасти этот мир и тех, кто ему дорог.

Остались три года до появления Теневого Мира! Измените прошлое и соберите могущественных товарищей, чтобы спасти человечество!

description.vi:
Desir vật lộn trong Mê cung bóng tối suốt 10 năm dài đằng đẵng, chứng kiến đồng đội và bạn bè lần lượt ngã xuống, mãi đến khi toàn đội cả trăm người chỉ còn vỏn vẹn 6 người thì mới đánh bại được kẻ thù chung. Những tưởng đã cứu được thế giới khỏi nguy cơ diệt vong, nào ngờ tai họa bất ngờ ập đến cuốn trôi tất cả mọi thứ. Lần nữa tỉnh lại, Desir phát hiện mình đã quay ngược thời gian trở về ngày đầu nhập học ở Học viện Hebrion. Liệu lần này anh có thể bảo vệ những người mình thương yêu và cứu vớt thế giới không?

description.zh-hk:
「既然已經回來了，
就不能再次失去心愛的人們!」

人類正面臨最可怕的災難——影之迷宮。
戴基爾．阿曼德是迷宮裡最後的6名倖存者之一。
他們試圖挑戰迷宮的最後關卡，
然而卻以失敗告終，
世界最終走向滅亡。

當以為一切已經結束的那刻，
戴基爾卻回到了13年前的過去?!

當時的戴基爾正要進入帝國最強的魔法學院——
赫布里溫學院就讀，
並且與在迷宮中逝去的珍貴夥伴們重逢。
為了拯救他心愛的人們與這個世界，
他決心要改變過去...!

距離影之世界出現的時間只剩3年了!
快召集強悍的同伴一同拯救世界吧!

altTitles.ja: スカライティ

description.en: In a world that has come to an end, a robot continues along on a solitary journey. Ars’ goal is to cut off any lingering attachments of the surviving humans, in order to “kill” them. The activities of the humans living in this dystopia… are surely beautiful. A fickle yet gentle apocalyptic travelogue begins—

altTitles.en: The Galactic Navy Officer Becomes an Adventurer

altTitles.ja: 航宙軍士官、冒険者になる

altTitles.pt-br: Capitão Corinth: Um Oficial da Marinha Galáctica Torna-se um Aventureiro

altTitles.en: Captain Corinth: The Galactic Navy Officer Becomes an Adventurer

description.en:
In order to protect the planet Ares from invasion by the Bugs, Alan Corinth has set his sights on nothing less than ruling the entire continent. The Kingdom of Belta, which borders the Great Demon Forest, is the ideal spot to start putting his plan in motion, so he and his party set off for the gathering place of the finest adventurers the kingdom has to offer: the citadel of Gantz.

Will Alan be able to keep the hostile aliens from overrunning this fantasy planet?  The sci-fi medieval fantasy story begins!
description.pt-br:
A nave espacial que o oficial da Marinha Imperial Galáctica que Alan Corinth estava foi derrubada por um ataque surpresa durante a navegação no hiperespaço.

Completamente a deriva, e sobre uma estranha coincidência, Alan se tornou o único na nave a sobreviver. A nave espacial severamente danificada perdeu suas capacidades de navegação e despencou em um planeta próximo.

Usando uma cápsula de fuga, Alan dirigiu-se ao planeta sozinho.

Assim começou a busca de Alan pela sobrevivência no planeta subdesenvolvido utilizando as nanomáquinas simbiótica dentro de seu corpo.

Surpreendentemente, o planeta era o lar de uma próspera civilização humana cujo código genético se assemelhava ao de Alan.

Mesmo permanecendo perdido devido a ser jogado em um mundo de espadas e magia, ele tenta viver o melhor que pode junto com seus novos companheiros.

O que Alan conseguiria nesse mundo estranho?

A história de fantasia de ficção científica em um cenário medieval agora começa!

altTitles.zh: 如果他們是同學, se eles fossem amigos de classe

title.en: Teisou Gyakuten Sekai no Doutei Henkyou Ryoushu Kishi

altTitles.ja: 貞操逆転世界の童貞辺境領主騎士

altTitles.en: Virgin Knight who is the Frontier Lord in the Gender Switched World

altTitles.zh-hk: 貞操逆轉世界的童貞邊境領主騎士

altTitles.en: Virgin Frontier Lord Knight In The Chastity-Switched World

description.en: After being reincarnated into another world where the chastity and moral values of men and women are reversed and women rule the land, Faust was raised by his mother as a rare male knight. He's quick to become a war hero with many achievements under his belt, but because he inherited his way of thinking from his previous world, there's a certain severe pain in his groin day in and day out when faced with the likes of a scantily clad Queen who may as well be in the nude or the sexual harassment of the well endowed Duchess he calls a friend, among others...
description.ja: 男女の貞操観念が真逆で女が国を支配する異世界に、現代日本から転生したファウストは男騎士として育てられた。数々の武功を上げ英雄と謳われるようになるも、前世の価値感を持つが故に、女王のほぼ全裸な薄着姿や巨乳公爵からのセクハラ的スキンシップに股間を痛める日々で……。

title.en: Classmate no Moto Idol ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin Nan desu

altTitles.ja: クラスメイトの元アイドルが、とにかく挙動不審なんです。

altTitles.en: The Idol Girl in My Class Is Acting Suspiciously

altTitles.ja-ro: Class no Idol Bishoujo ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin nan desu

description.en: Saegusa, who retired from idolry when she went to high school, is good-looking and intelligent. She is always cheerful and friendly, and is the most popular person at school. Takuya, however, knows a certain side of the highbrow Miss Saegusa. Today, too, a suspicious-looking woman in a dubious disguise appears at the convenience store where he works part-time. She is, in all likelihood, that Saegusa-san...?
description.ja: 高校進学を機にアイドルを引退した三枝さんは、容姿端麗かつ頭脳明晰。いつも明るくて人当たりも良く、学校で一番の人気者だ。しかし、そんな高嶺の花である三枝さんのとある一面を卓也は知っている。今日もバイト先のコンビニに現れる、怪しげな変装をした挙動不審な女性――。彼女はどう見てもあの三枝さんで…!?

altTitles.ja: スマイリー

description.en: Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
description.ru:
Томодзи Камомэ — писатель-фрилансер, потерявший любимую дочь в результате несчастного случая. В отчаянии от него уходит жена, и он проводит свои дни в одиночестве, закрывшись от внешнего мира.
Однако однажды листовка странной религиозной группы «Общество смеющегося сердца» меняет его судьбу. В ней он увидел свою жену, с которой потерял связь...

altTitles.ja: 運命のひと

description.ja: Izumi is your average, run-of-the-mill beta. But for some peculiar reason, he has a lucky streak of dating alphas. After breaking up with his most recent alpha girlfriend, Izumi starts questioning his circumstances. Although dating an alpha as a beta was a mark of success, Izumi didn't get what the whole fuss was about and felt suffocated by his dominant partner. While talking with his beta friend about his dating life at a bar for betas and alphas, Izumi suddenly feels overwhelmed with the scent of... flowers...?

description.ar: تسو تيانشين هو آخر إنسان حي في مدينة مليئة بالزومبي. فقط عندما كان متأكداً من أنه مات ، يجد روحه تعود إلى ما قبل ذلك اليوم المشؤوم قبل عشر سنوات. يقسم أنه سوف يحمي الناس المهمين له هذه المرة ويجتمع مع عشيقته. تابعوا نضاله من أجل البقاء بمساعدة ذكرياته للسنوات العشر القادمة!
description.en: Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!
description.fr: uo Tianchen est l'un des derniers survivants sur terre depuis qu'une épidémie venant de l'espace s'était abattue sur terre, il l'y a de cela 10 ans. Alors qu'il est sur le point de mourir, Zuo fît donc ses adieux à sa petite amie qu'il avait rencontré durant l'épidémie. C'est alors que, d'un coup, alors qu'il était sur le point de mourir, il retourna dans le temps 10 ans auparavant, quelques heures avant le début de l'épidémie. C'est alors qu'il décida de sauver son meilleur ami qui avait périt dès le début de l'épidémie, 10 ans auparavant, et c'est alors qu'il se met à la recherche de sa copine qu'il avait dans l'ancienne apocalypse.
description.ru:
Зе Тянчен – последний выживший человек в городе, зараженном зомби-инфекцией. Будучи на грани смерти, он внезапно оказался в своем теле десять лет назад, когда город еще не был заражен. Он решил, что в этот раз спасет близких ему людей и воссоединится со своей старой любовью.   
  
Следите за его приключениями, в которых он использует свои воспоминания о следующих 10 годах, чтобы выжить и спасти своих близких!

title.en: The Apothecary Diaries - The Imperial Family, the La Clan, and JinMao As Childhood Friends (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと - 皇帝一家と羅一家と幼馴染壬猫

altTitles.ja-ro: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto - Koutei ikka to Ra Kazuya to Osananajimi Mizunoe Neko

altTitles.ja: 容疑者Aの花嫁

description.en: The "erotic love suspense" manga centers on Hana, who returns to her family after her husband dies. She lives every day in an oppressive atmosphere, until one day her parents start talking about having a marriage interview for her with a globally renowned artist named Aoi.
description.ja: 夫を亡くし、実家に戻った羽菜。息苦しい毎日を送っていたある日、世界的に有名な画家・蒼井重瑠との見合い話が持ち上がる。今の生活から逃れるために、蒼井との再婚を受け入れた羽菜だけど…彼は、前妻3人を殺した連続殺人事件の容疑者で――！？

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.ja: 愛に囚われて

description.en: Nan Zhi's the C.E.O. of an entertainment company, flawless and capable. Few know of her nighttime secrets. However, that kind of indulgence never made her happy--until ***she*** appeared. Initially thinking she was just a stranger, Nan Zhi later discovered the other woman was the little sister of her best friend, and new talent at her company. Facing the younger woman's persistence, will Nan Zhi gradually become addicted to her?

title.en: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Dreaming Girl

altTitles.ja: 青春ブタ野郎はゆめみる少女の夢を見ない

altTitles.ru: Этот глупый свин не понимает мечту девочки-мечтательницы

altTitles.ja-ro: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Yumemiru Shoujo no Yume wo Minai

description.en:
The Shouko arc of "Rascal" series, Dengeki Bunko's popular works, serialized as manga!

Just before summer vacation starts, Makinohara Shouko, a middle school second year student, met a high school student named Azusagawa Sakuta. Sakuta gave Shouko a desire to live, then...
Experience the love story, with Shouko as the main character, in a way only possible through manga.

*From ComicWalker, translated*

title.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

altTitles.ja: 薫る花は凛と咲く

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja: #薫る花

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

altTitles.zh: 长官！本次战场是这里吗？

description.en: Elite Special Forces Captain Lee Yoon-ah, who is said to be Korea's nerd. As a soldier to the bone, there was no romance in her life. However, a completely different world unfolds in front of her, who lost her mind after being hit by a shell while dispatched overseas. Being possessed by a romance fantasy novel written by a friend! She also becomes an extra 'Rosalie' who lives a miserable life. Taking a deep breath and shaking her head for a moment, she considers this a battlefield and decides to change her life. "This is a class society." "Because I've experienced enough to get tired of a hierarchical society called the military." "Are you disobeying my orders now?" Captain who conquers the duke with absolute charisma! However, she unintentionally seizes the romance... "Duke, how does it feel to kneel down to the Crown Prince? It's the first time you've kneeled down to anyone other than the Emperor." The original male lead, not the female lead, falls to her knees. Captain, who didn't care about love, can you win this battlefield?
description.pt-br: Capitão das Forças Especiais de Elite Lee Yoon-ah, que dizem ser o nerd da Coreia. Como soldado até os ossos, não havia romance em sua vida. No entanto, um mundo completamente diferente se desenrola diante dela, que enlouqueceu após ser atingida por um projétil enquanto era despachada para o exterior. Ser possuído por um romance de fantasia escrito por um amigo! Ela também se torna uma 'Rosalie' extra que vive uma vida miserável. Respirando fundo e balançando a cabeça por um momento, ela considera isso um campo de batalha e decide mudar de vida. “Esta é uma sociedade de classes.” “Porque já experimentei o suficiente para me cansar de uma sociedade hierárquica chamada militar.” "Você está desobedecendo minhas ordens agora?" Capitão que conquista o duque com carisma absoluto! No entanto, ela involuntariamente agarra o romance ... “Duke, como é se ajoelhar para o príncipe herdeiro? É a primeira vez que você se ajoelha diante de alguém que não seja o imperador. O protagonista masculino original, não o protagonista feminino, cai de joelhos. Capitão, que não se importava com o amor, você pode vencer este campo de batalha?

altTitles.ja: ナポレオン 獅子の時代

description.en: This is a story of the life of Napoleon. The tale begins just before the Battle of Austerlitz. Then, it jumps back to 1769 to tell the story of Napoleon's life from the very beginning, including the circumstances of his birth, his childhood on Corsica, and his difficulties as a Corsican boy in a French school. All of these experiences eventually culminate in his becoming the famous Emperor of the French.
description.ja: フランス革命に始まり、イタリア戦役を経て、皇帝への道を駆け進む一人の英雄ナポレオン・ボナパルトの生涯を描く、壮大な英雄譚!!　血みどろ汗の臭いムンムンな一人の「漢」が、獅子のごとく吠える。吼える！　フランス近代史重厚ストーリー!!

altTitles.ja: 不機嫌なフォトジェニック

description.ja: Kohei is a high school student whose passion is photography. Bright, cheerful, and full of curiosity, Kohei declares his love for the school doctor, Kenichiro Tachibana, after meeting him in what's called the Locked Infirmary. He isn't shy about his feelings, but Kenichiro seems to have a past... With the earnest affection of a puppy, Kohei pushes on. How will he win the love of the sulky and impregnable older man who's full of mature appeal in this love comedy between opposites who are linked by photography!?

altTitles.ja: 酩酊の女傭兵ベル。

altTitles.vi: Belle cô lính đánh thuê hệ cồn

altTitles.th: ทหารรับจ้างสาวขี้เมา เบล

description.en:
A young traveller, when looking to take on a mercenary as protection against bandits, is forced to go with the cheapest: a young, cheerfully drunken warrior girl, who spends her income mostly on alcohol.
___
**Note**: Chapters “6.7” and “9.10” are Chapters 6 & 7 and 9 & 10 respectively. Chapters 6 and 9 are textless (and therefore have nothing to translate), so they've been put together with the successive chapter to comply with MangaDex rules.

(In a made-up dynasty) During the Chen dynasty, Consort Jing gave birth to a pair of fraternal twins under the rays of sunlight. The prince was born with a cinnabar mole between his eyebrows, while the princess was born with six fingers.

Fortune and misfortune appeared at the same time, causing the twins to experience entirely different fates as they were forced to leave their family. The heavenly tribulation is approaching, will the two twins who were separated from birth ever get to be reunited? What methods would they use to fight against their destinies?

---

description.zh: （架空朝代）大陈年间，菁贵妃霞光中诞下双生龙凤胎。皇子生来眉间一颗朱砂痣，皇女天生六指 。祥瑞与不祥同时出现，令同胞双生的二人迎来截然不同的命运，被迫与至亲分离。天劫将至，自出生便相离的他们是否能重逢？彼此又以何种方式与天命相争？

description.en:
A story about the twisted entanglement between a depressed, shut-in, have-been mangaka, and another best-seller, Super Darling mangaka.
This is an independent manga done by Eno Sumi (After God) under the alias of Hanae Deki (英恵 溺).

altTitles.ja: 青空ラバー

description.en: Taichi, the older brother, and Yo, the younger brother, were born as twins. They grew up together, both fell in love with table tennis, and both fell in love with their childhood friend Shuri. However, one day, Yo became an active player in many tournaments, while Taichi quit ping-pong and lived a carefree life. One day, an incident occurred. This incident triggered the destiny of Taichi, Yo, and Shuri to begin to move violently..!

title.en: My Sect's Senior Disciple Has a Hole in His Brain

altTitles.en: There's a Pit in My Senior's Brain
There's Something Wrong with My Da Shixiong's Brain

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Jia Da Shi Xiong Nao Zi You Keng

description.en:
The hilarious adventures of the eldest disciple of a sect who has a problem with his brain. Dong Fang Xian Yun was reincarnated as the most senior disciple of the Carefree sect. But the only thing that goes through his mind is to make sure he doesn't end up dying by the hands of the "main character". Read as he makes no sense to his fellow disciples while avoiding flags left and right.  
  
*Note : Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing, some of chapter combining into one.*

Kang Chae-rin is a social media addict. She works hard, but she rarely gains followers. Chae-rin, who wanted to quickly live the life of an influencer, gets to know Yeon-woo, a returning student, and also an influencer. She approaches Yeon-woo thinking that if she gets attached to her, she will gain follower too!

Mostly started as a seiyuu connection joke, since Snake's Japanese voice actor Ootsuka Akio is also the narrator for Yurucamp.  
Plot - Snake infiltrates camps and begins his mission: to make comments during the events.

description.en:
In order to clear the name of 'Emi,' a girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess' revenge to begin!
description.id:
Agar bisa membersihkan nama "Emi", yaitu nama seorang gadis yang bereinkarnasi menjadi Remilia sang villainess dari sebuah game otome, Remilia asli yang selama ini mengawasi emi dari dalam akhirnya telah tersadar.

Sekarang adalah waktunya bagi sang villainess yang asli untuk membalaskan dendamnya!

description.en: Playing Dumb Sterella Brother vs Beautiful, Strong, Miserable White Dragon Brother. Top Omegan white dragon Shou Yue killed the mafia boss, Si Xian, but saved his only son -- Si Mojue, and raised him like a younger brother. Unbeknownst to him, Si Mojue was an Alpha Sterella, only playing the part of a nice brother in front of Shou Yue, doing his best to become the person closest to him to avenge his father's death... An avenger, a murderer, and when the secret is revealed, what will they do?

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.ja: 昴 スバル
昴

altTitles.th: ซูบารุ เต้นสุดใจ ไกลสุดฝัน

description.en: A small five-year-old girl named Subaru no longer has time for friends and play. Why is this? Her twin brother Kazuma is dying… and gradually forgetting everything. Even Subaru. And so the girl visits him every day, talking with him and dancing for him, trying to make him remember her. And he always does by the end of the day. Encouraged by a friend to join ballet classes, the girl does so and falls in love with the dance.

A college student get's hit by a bus and wakes up in the world of her favourite DatingSim Game " Miracle Lovers " as a side character with no role. Not only is she a mere supporting role, her character is also destined to die, when she turns 18. Can she change her destiny and live peacefully?  
 
If you want to translate my work please ask for permission first.

altTitles.en: Only One Day Remaining to Break All My Destruction Flags: 24 Hour Just Deserts Speedrun

description.en:
Alexandra is the duchess of the Kingdom of Tarraconensis. It was only the day before the absolution event that she realized that she was the villainous daughter of an otome game! It's clear that she'll be denounced and her engagement will be broken tomorrow.
But I don't want to be condemned honestly! I'd rather show my eyes to the people who despised me! With only 24 hours left, Alexandra begins to make a breakthrough in her desperate situation.
description.id:
Alexandra adalah putri seorang duke dari Kerajaan Tarraconensis. 
Ketika dia telah sadar jika dia adalah seorang villaness dari sebuah otome game, waktu yang tersisa sebelum acara pembatalan pertunangan hanya tersisa satu hari saja!
Sudah dipastikan bahwa saat itu akan diumumkan pembatalan pertunangannya!
Tapi dia tidak ingin hanya menerima pembatalan itu! melainkan dia ingin melakukan perlawanan kepada orang-orang yang membencinya!
Hanya tersisa 24 jam saja, alexandra memulai langkahnya untuk bisa keluar dari situasi keputus-asaan ini.

altTitles.es-la: El sabio es invocado a otro mundo ~Los artículos más fuertes eran los menos deseados del inventario~

altTitles.ko: 소환된 현자는 이세계를 누빈다 ~최강인 것은 필요없는 재고 아이템이었습니다~

altTitles.zh-hk: 被召喚的賢者前往異世界～廢棄庫存道具才是最強～

altTitles.zh: 被召唤的贤者前往异世界～废弃库存道具才是最强～

description.en:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
description.es-la:
Touya, el jugador mas fuerte del juego Pandemic World Online, ha ganado tantos items que decidió crear una cuenta alternativa para almacenarlos, mientras jugaba fue invocado a otro mundo, pero al no tener la categoría de héroe es desechado y remplazado por otra persona, ahora tendrá que sobrevivir solo en ese mundo y con el personaje que creó para almacenar esos objetos.
